definitions.definition: A puzzle video game in which falling tetrominoes must be manipulated to form complete lines, which are then cleared from the grid.
( figuratively ) An endeavor involving rearranging things of different shape into a physical space.

main_definition: A puzzle video game in which falling tetrominoes must be manipulated to form complete lines, which are then cleared from the grid.
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) An endeavor involving rearranging things of different shape into a physical space.

definitions.definition: The act of clearing four lines at once (the maximum possible) in Tetris .

main_definition: ( video games , by extension ) The act of clearing four lines at once (the maximum possible) in Tetris .
